landing.hero_title: Your Work. Your Clients. Your Freedom
landing.hero_subtitle: Join Vitago — where you choose your work, set your rates, and build your future.
landing.vitago_description: Vitago is a digital marketplace that connects cleaners with customers – quickly, easily, and without middlemen. You decide when, where, and with whom you want to work. Earn better pay, enjoy more freedom, and take greater control of your time. Start building your own future with Vitago.
landing.scroll_down: Scroll down to calculate your price

advantages.title: Expand Your Reach
advantages.description: Access a growing network of customers actively seeking reliable cleaning services—put your business in front of thousands of potential clients.

advantages.title: Flexible Scheduling
advantages.description: Control your work calendar and accept jobs that suit your lifestyle. Our platform adapts to your unique schedule.

advantages.title: Effortless Management
advantages.description: Manage appointments, receive payments, and process payments all in one intuitive dashboard—no more juggling multiple systems.

advantages.title: Higher Take-Home Pay
advantages.description: By working directly with Vitago, you can earn more than double through traditional cleaning companies. Our low-fee platform ensures you keep more of your hard-earned income.

advantages.title: No Company Required
advantages.description: You don't need to set up your own company. Our platform handles all legal, tax, and RUT deduction processing, and your net earnings are automatically deposited directly into your bank account.

landing.calculate_price_subtitle: The calculator below gives an indication of your potential compensation on the Vitago platform.
landing.faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about becoming a Vitago cleaning provider

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: To get started, simply pre-register or sign up as a provider, complete your profile, and follow the onboarding steps. Once approved, you can begin accepting jobs and managing your schedule.

faq.question: Who can register as a service provider on Vitago?
faq.answer: Anyone who wants the freedom to choose when, where, and with whom they work. You must have the legal right to work in Sweden.

faq.question: Is there a minimum number of hours I need to work?
faq.answer: No. With Vitago, you decide when and how much you want to work. There are no minimum hours — it's completely up to you. Work full-time, part-time, or just occasionally — your schedule, your choice.

faq.question: Who sets the price for an assignment?
faq.answer: you decide your rate per hour which is then accepted by the customer.

faq.question: How do I get paid?
faq.answer: Your compensation is paid on a monthly basis via our partner after the customer approves the completed assignment. Taxes and fees are handled by them. Use our calculator to see an estimation of your monthly compensation

faq.question: What happens if the customer is not satisfied?
faq.answer: Any disputes must be resolved directly between you and the customer. Vitago is not a party to the agreement.

faq.question: Am I employed by Vitago?
faq.answer: No, you are an independent contractor and are responsible for scheduling, service delivery, and communication with your clients. Our partner will handle your taxes

faq.question: Can I close my account at any time?
faq.answer: Yes, you can close your account at any time. Ongoing assignments should be completed or resolved with the customer before termination

faq.question: What is the pilot program and how can I participate?
faq.answer: Vitago is a new platform. We are looking for volunteers who use the platform as usual but are willing to give us feedback on functionality that makes the use better and more intuitive. Participation is voluntary and helps us improve the platform. In addition to the opportunity to influence the design of the platform, you will get started earlier and have time to build your network of customers.

footer.pre_register_link: Pre-register now to be part of our exclusive launch pilot!
footer.pilot_advantage: Pilot Advantage: Early users in the pilot program may get extra visibility, build a larger client base, and the benefits and opportunity to influence the app functionality.

landing.calculate_price_income_before_tax_toolti: After deduction of employer's contribution 31.42% and platform fee 7%

consent.title: Terms of Service for Service Providers

platform.title: About the Platform
platform.description: Vitago is a digital marketplace that connects customers with independent service providers for household services.

independent.title: Independent Contracting
independent.description: Service providers are not employees of Vitago but operate as independent contractors. By registering as a service provider, you confirm that you act as a self-employed individual or through a self-employment service.

responsibilities.title: Vitago functions solely as an intermediary platform and does not assume employer responsibility for service providers. This means that we are not responsible for:
items: Work management or scheduling of assignments
Taxes, employer contributions, or social fees
Any disputes between customers and service providers

work_permit.title: Requirement for Valid Work and Residence Permits
work_permit.description: To use Vitago as a service provider, you must have the legal right to work in Sweden according to applicable laws and regulations.

requirements.non_eu: If you are a citizen of a country outside the EU/EEA or Switzerland, you must have a valid work permit and/or residence permit that entitles you to work in Sweden.
requirements.eu: If you are an EU/EEA citizen, you must meet the requirements for the right of residence in Sweden, which means you must either be employed, self-employed, a student, or have sufficient means to support yourself.

data_privacy.title: Processing of Personal Data and Sharing with Subcontractors
data_privacy.description: By using the platform, you agree that Vitago processes your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy. You also agree that we may share your data with trusted subcontractors and partners to provide and improve our services.

payment.title: Invoicing and Payment through our partner
payment.description: Invoicing to customers and payment of compensation to service providers are handled by the third-party, our partner, which acts as a self-employment service.
terms: Your compensation will be paid by our partner after completion of the assignment and approval by the customer
Our partner is responsible for the payment of taxes and fees in accordance with Swedish law

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Vitago provides only a technical solution for connecting customers and service providers. We are not responsible for:
items: The quality of the services provided
Damages that occur during the execution of assignments
Misunderstandings or lack of communication between customers and service providers

booking.unavailableTimesDescription: Some time slots are disabled due to existing bookings or provider unavailability
booking.endTimeMustBeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time

providers.cannotChangeSuperAdminRole: Cannot change the role of the super admin account. This account has the highest level of permissions.

settings.title: Admin Settings
settings.description: Manage admin settings and configuration options

settings.accountDescription: Manage admin account preferences and profile settings
settings.securityDescription: Configure security policies and access controls
settings.translationDescription: Manage and edit platform translations for all supported languages

editLocales.title: Admin Panel - Translations
editLocales.helpText: As an admin, you can help improve our platform's translations. Here's how to use this tool:
editLocales.searchInstructions: Use the search box above to find specific words or phrases. The tool will automatically show the language where the term was found.
editLocales.editInstructions: You can copy and paste text directly from the website into the translation fields. Edit the text as needed to improve the translation. Changes are automatically saved as you type.
editLocales.exportInstructions: Click the "Export Changes" button when you're done. Only your modified translations will be exported.
editLocales.thankYou: Your input will help make Vitago more accessible to users worldwide! Thank you for your contribution.
editLocales.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all values?
editLocales.resetConfirm: Reset to original values and clear all saved changes?

noProviderEnablers: This provider has not specified any items they can bring.
